scripts.dc:bash: sudo docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.yml exec api bash
scripts.dc:restart: sudo docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.yml restart api
scripts.dc:test: sudo docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.yml exec api bash -c 'python manage.py test'
scripts.dc:mig: sudo docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.yml exec api bash -c 'python manage.py makemigrations && python manage.py migrate'
